矰字的基本解释

矰
zēng
古代用来射鸟的拴着丝绳的短箭：“矰矢、茀矢，用诸弋射。”
泛指短箭：“帝俊赐羿彤弓素矰，以扶下国。”

矰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zēng］
［《廣韻》作滕切，平登，精。］
(1)系有生丝绳以射飞鸟的箭。
(2)短箭。
(3)通“贈”。送走，驱逐。

矰字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【矢字部】　矰； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页825第26
【唐韻】作滕切【集韻】【韻會】咨騰切【正韻】咨登切，?音增。【說文】隿䠶矢也。【玉篇】結繳於矢也。【周禮·夏官】矰矢用諸弋射。【註】矰，高也，可以弋飛鳥。【史記·老子傳】飛者可以爲矰。【班固·西都賦】矰繳相纏。【吳越春秋】吳師中軍素羽之矰，左軍朱羽之矰，右軍烏羽之矰。【註】矰，短矢。韋昭曰：矢名。　又【韻會】通作繒。【三輔黃圖】佽飛具繒繳，以射鳧鴈。【註】箭有綸曰繒繳，卽綸也。　【集韻】或作?。

矰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
矰字的起名意思

暂无。

arrow with a streamer
Basic explanation of words
arrow with a streamer
zēng
A short arrow tied with a silk rope used to shoot birds in ancient times: "Shooting arrows and arrows, shooting with all kinds of arrows."
Refers to short arrows in general: "Emperor Jun bestows Yitong bows to support the country."
arrow with a streamer
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zēng］
["Guangyun" made Tengqie, Pingdeng, Jing. ]
(1) Arrows with raw silk ropes to shoot birds.
(2) Short arrows.
(3) Through "Gift". Sent away, expelled.
arrow with a streamer

[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Vector Characters] 　矰; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 825 26
[Tang Yun] for Tengqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Tengqie for counseling [Zhengyun] For Tengqie for counseling, increase in sound. 【Said the text】Kai Shi also. [Jade articles] Settled in Yuya. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan】The arrows are shot with Zhu Yi. [Note] Yan, Gao Ye, you can fly birds. [Historical Records·Laozi Biography] Flying can be a scorpion. [Ban Gu·Xi Du Fu] Sui pay intertwined. [Wu Yue Chunqiu] Wu Yuzhi of the middle army of Wu Shi, Zhu Yu of the left army, and Wuyu of the right army. [Note] 矰, short arrow. Wei Zhao said: The name of the arrow.　[Rhyme Club] It's all made up. [Three-assisted yellow picture] Yu Fei has a hand in hand to shoot the mallard geese. [Note] Jianyoulun said Zhuanjiao, Yilun also.　【Jiyun】or make?.
